alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range; Santa Ynez Valley; Ventura County Beaches (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 21 at 4:02PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...SHOWERS WITH LOCALLY STRONG WIND GUSTS WILL IMPACT FAR WESTERN VENTURA AS WELL AS SOUTHERN AND CENTRAL SANTA BARBARA COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM PST... At 359 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking numerous showers moving across southern and central Santa Barbara County, and far western Ventura County. Movement was to the north. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar and surface observations indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Barbara... Montecito... Santa Ynez... Carpinteria... Solvang... El Capitan State Beach... Summerland... Refugio State Beach... Isla Vista... Goleta... Mission Canyon... Highway 154 over San Marcos Pass... Hope Ranch... Santa Barbara Air[port... and Lake Cachuma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rains capable of producing flooding will remain possible, and a Flood Warning is in effect for Southern Santa Barbara County.
